text: Baek Seung-hyeon (born Baek Seung-wook on March 1, 1975) is a South Korean actor. Baek has starred in supporting roles in television series such as Cain and Abel (2009), Brilliant Legacy (2009) and Prosecutor Princess (2010). == Filmography == === Film === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
